column4: Hey the problem is I am in the desert right now and I don't have any blank cds or a removable hard drive.  For this I need a cd.  If there is a chance I will lose my home folder (I know what it is ;) cut me a little credit) than I will just wait until I can back it up
Yes that link said I needed to boot from the live CD
and also when you have a chance, split at least / and /home over 2 partitions
